div.a: The Ten Most Destructive Computer Viruses

div.div: Created by amateur hackers, underground crime syndicates and government agencies, these powerful viruses have done serious damage to computer networks worldwide.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XAswI1&via=Digg&text=The Ten Most Destructive Computer Viruses

div.div: DATA SHOWS MAKEUP SEX IS UNLIKELY

div.a: Nate Silver Offers Up A Statistical Analysis Of Your Failing Relationship

div.div: He's accurately predicted 50 out of 50 breakups this year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XDe66I&via=Digg&text=Nate Silver Offers Up A Statistical Analysis Of Your Failing Relationship

div.a: This Is What The White House Looks Like Completely Gutted

div.div: After being burned by the British in 1814 and hastily modernized with 20th-century innovations such as indoor plumbing, electricity, and heating ducts, Harry Truman inherited a White House in a near-condemnable state. So it was gutted.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yybne0&via=Digg&text=This Is What The White House Looks Like Completely Gutted

div.a: How Valve Hires, How It Fires, And How Much It Pays

div.div: Game developers the world over have been curious about the inner-workings of Steam and Half-Life maker Valve, particularly following the public availability of a company handbook revealed that Valve has no managers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZyHSMb&via=Digg&text=How Valve Hires, How It Fires, And How Much It Pays

div.a: What Is Art Criticism Good For?

div.div: Criticism is in trouble. These days, art that many critics agree is terrible is selling for outlandish sums of money. So what do we actually want from our critics today, and what can they realistically provide? What needs to change for them to be able to deliver the goods?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XSRE8P&via=Digg&text=What Is Art Criticism Good For?

div.a: The On1on Is Like The Onion, But Real

div.div: A couple of geniuses created the On1on, a parody/not-parody news site that parodies the parody news site the Onion. Confused yet?

div.div: AT LEAST SOMETHING GOOD CAME FROM IT

div.a: Oscars' 'We Saw Your Boobs' Bit Has Predictable Effect On IMDB Rankings

div.div: Regardless of your tweetable opinions about Seth MacFarlane’s hosting abilities, there exists one undeniable takeaway from Sunday night’s Oscars: “We Saw Your Boobs” raised all kinds of awareness of topless actors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YWvvbW&via=Digg&text=Oscars' 'We Saw Your Boobs' Bit Has Predictable Effect On IMDB Rankings

div.a: How Strong Is Human Skin?

div.div: The mechanical properties of skin are important factors in everything from forensic science to razor blade design. And yet studies that have actually measured these properties had never been done on actual human skin. Until now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XbUvfX&via=Digg&text=How Strong Is Human Skin?

div.a: The Old Woman And The Sea

div.div: Cecilia Villegas is a 77-year-old woman who lives on the island of Cano Viejo. Reuters photographer Juan Carlos Ulate has beautifully documented her daily life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15Oh92t&via=Digg&text=The Old Woman And The Sea

div.a: What Is The Troll?

div.div: What distinguishes the troll from the mere asshole is, I believe, that he (1) has a target; (2) seeks to get a response—a rise—out of that target; and (3) believes he is acting out of some ordained moral purpose to destroy, to bring down his target.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XDFB05&via=Digg&text=What Is The Troll?

div.div: HE'D LIKE TO THANK THE ACADEMY

div.a: What Uncle Sam Charges Anne Hathaway For Her $47K Oscar Goody Bag

div.div: An all-expenses paid trip to Australia, a gift certificate for a facelift, and oh yea, a bottle of Windex. These are just some of the items celebrities received on the film industry’s biggest night of the year, and Uncle Sam will get his piece.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YwLQnP&via=Digg&text=What Uncle Sam Charges Anne Hathaway For Her $47K Oscar Goody Bag

div.a: Death On The Mississippi

div.div: Few people know about the Sultana, despite the fact that it suffered the worst maritime disaster in U.S. history. For some reason, it is almost completely ignored by history books. Here's the tragic story.
